title: Hook, line and sinker
creator_credit: Esso Film Unit, Andrew Rice and Roy Layzell
brief_description: A description of the trip made by a new type of line fishing vessel on her maiden voyage to northern waters. Demonstrates the modern equipment of the Scottish-built ship with its refrigeration, line hauling tackle and diesel engine and brings out the skill and efficiency of the crew.
